net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm

Class ClassicalALAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm.AbstractALAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.algorithm.ClassicalALAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAlgorithm, IConfigure, ITool, JCLAL

    public class ClassicalALAlgorithm
extends AbstractALAlgorithm
implements ITool
    Class that represents a Classical Active Learning Algorithm.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
